localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

previous.excerpt:
A big part of this is Bitcoin rallying, but also a lot of other cryptocurrencies
are up 50-150% this week. Ethereum, the second largest, is up 61%. Stellar
notably has jumped up 164%.

The rally appears to have been prompted by regulatory guidance allowing banks to
transact in stablecoins, as the…
previous.title: The total value of all cryptocurrencies passed $1 trillion Wednesday for the first time ever, per CoinGecko‘s index of 6,124 assets.

localize.title: 根据CoinGecko的6124项资产指数，周三，所有加密货币的总价值首次超过1万亿美元。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
这其中很大一部分是比特币的上涨，但也有很多其他加密货币
本周上涨了50-150%。第二大的以太上涨了61%。星光灿烂
值得注意的是，它跃升了164%。

这波反弹似乎是由监管指引推动的，监管指引允许银行
以稳定的方式进行交易，如…

localize.title: 根據CoinGecko的6124項資產指數，週三，所有加密貨幣的總價值首次超過1萬億美元。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
這其中很大一部分是比特幣的上漲，但也有很多其他加密貨幣
本週上漲了50-150%。第二大的以太上漲了61%。星光燦爛
值得注意的是，它躍升了164%。

這波反彈似乎是由監管指引推動的，監管指引允許銀行
以穩定的方式進行交易，如…

Tesla market value today (716 Billion) is about the same as the market value of
all the world's major car makers combined. In addition China's BYDDY (86B) and
Nio (78B) are both more valuable than Daimler (74B) even though NIO only
delivered less than 40,000 cars in all of 2020 with huge loss.…
next.title: TSLA - Tesla market value today is more valuable than all the world's major auto makers combined - what gives?
